interpretation:
The 🔆 "bright button" card represents a moment of clarity and illumination. This emoji is often used to symbolize the sun or brightness, indicating that something previously unclear or hidden is now being brought to light. It can signify a breakthrough or a moment of realization, where everything suddenly makes sense. This card may also represent a sense of optimism or positivity, as if the sun has come out after a period of darkness.

In a tarot reading, the 🔆 "bright button" card may suggest that the querent is about to experience a moment of enlightenment or clarity. They may suddenly see a situation from a new perspective, or gain insight into a problem that has been bothering them. This card may also encourage the querent to stay positive and optimistic, even in the face of adversity, as the sun always rises after a dark night.
